data.description:
Immerse yourself in the captivating horror world of "Horror Zombies Mixed Reality" and get ready for an unforgettable scary experience!

THEY ARE HERE!
Arm yourself with an arsenal of weapons, including sleek pistols, a precise rifle, and a powerful shotgun, as you engage in pulse-pounding battles against the relentless undead zombies.

MIXED REALITY
Dive headfirst into the experience with the innovative Mixed Reality, leveraging the cutting-edge passthrough technology of the Meta Quest VR headset. Feel the intensity as you fend off horror zombies not just in the game, but also in the familiar surroundings of YOUR own home.

SOUNDTRACK 
As the undead hordes close in, be prepared for an extra dose of adrenaline with the pulse-pounding soundtrack that intensifies the atmosphere and propels you deeper into the heart-pounding action!

HIGHLIGHTS
* Immerse in captivating Mixed Reality for an unforgettable experience.
* Battle zombies with diverse weapons, from pistols for fast combat to a rifle for distance and a shotgun for devastating close-range shots.
* Master survival skills at the tryout.
* Experience a pulse-pounding soundtrack intensifying the atmosphere.
* Accessibility settings with multiple options for everyone.

-> More content coming soon!

changelog.change_log:
Hey everyone!

I’m so pumped to share this new update with you! Thanks to all your awesome feedback, I’ve packed in a ton of cool changes and improvements.

What's New:

-New Doors and Windows: I’ve added new door and window objects for you to play around with.
-Destructible Room: Walls, Doors, and Windows can now break! Go ahead and unleash some chaos!
-Dual Pistols: Double pistols are replacing the unpopular melee weapons. More firepower, more fun!
-Graphics Boost: I’ve cranked up the visuals, so everything looks better than before.
-Performance Enhancements: The game should run smoother and be more stable now.
-New Horror Mode Soundtrack: Added some fresh tracks for horror mode to keep the adrenaline pumping.
-Rebalanced Gameplay: I’ve fine-tuned the game balance for a more fun experience.
-Tweaked Weapon Recoil: Shooting feels more satisfying with improved recoil.
-Zombie World Overhaul: The zombie world got a facelift!
-Small Space Optimization: The game now works better in smaller play spaces, so you can enjoy it anywhere.
-Better Physics: I’ve improved the physics to make everything feel more realistic and responsive.

Bug Fixes:

-Enemy Spawning: Fixed that frustrating bug where enemies didn’t spawn at the beginning.
-Enemy Spawning: Zombies will now spawn where they’re supposed to.
-Enemy Physics: Took care of some odd zombie behavior to keep things running smoothly.
-Enemy Physics: Zombies will no longer get stuck in walls.
-Crate Drops: No more crates dropping in weird places.
-Weapon Placement: Big weapons will no longer get stuck in the Floor.
… and more!

I’m so excited for you to dive in and experience all these updates. 
Thanks again for being such an amazing community—let’s get back to slaying zombies!

Version 1.1.2 is out now!
Changes:
- Improved ammunition balance
- Graphical enhancements
- Refined enemy ragdoll physics
- Minor fixes & adjustments

Thank you immensely for your feedback! 
We're thrilled to unveil the latest enhancements to the game:

- Expanded Arsenal: Introducing 2 new weapons - Rifle and Shotgun.
- Balanced Ammunition: Improved ammo balance for optimized gameplay.
- Dynamic Soundtrack: All-new, adrenaline-pumping soundtrack.
- Meta Space Map: Introducing Meta mapping for Quest 2 & Pro (v60+).
- Enhanced Visuals: Graphics and object upgrades.
- Refinements and Fixes: Minor adjustments and bug fixes.
